message: Let's split it 60/40. I'll take the lower amount, you can take the higher amount. We can call it a day.
You're lowballing me, let's try again. I'm willing to meet you in the middle.
I'm willing to compromise. Let's meet in the middle, but with a slight bias towards me. I'll take a bit more, but it's still a fair deal.
I'm starting to think you're not serious about compromising. I'll try to meet you in the middle, but I'm not giving up yet.
